title: Event Whites x2 event
text:
Heya Realmers,

We have a small surprise for you...

To take a small break from all the dungeon-hunting, we have prepared an Event Whites x2 Event! Roam around the Realm and defeat the mighty encounters for a double shot at those precious whites.

The Event will run from: 03/26 - 12:00 PM UTC


Until: 03/31 - 12:00 PM UTC

Whites that will have the doubled drop chance:

  • Blue Beehemoth Quiver
  • Cloak of Bloody Surprises
  • Crystallised Fang's Venom
  • Dirk of Cronus
  • Helm of the Juggernaut
  • Kageboshi
  • Orb of Conflict
  • Quiver of Thunder
  • Ray Katana
  • Red Beehemoth Quiver
  • Seal of Blasphemous Prayer
  • Shield of Ogmur
  • Tablet of the King's Avatar
  • Trap of the Vile Spirit
  • Yellow Beehemoth Quiver

    • Do you have your Shield of Ogmur yet?

    #Join us on:

    https://www.reddit.com/r/RotMG/

    https://Discord.gg/rotmg

    https://www.facebook.com/rotmg/

title: Exalt Supporter Beta - Patch 1
text:
Hello Realmers

Today we’ve released the new RotMG Exalt Supporter Beta Patch #1.

List of fixed bugs:

  • Accuracy always show 0%
  • Alien Leprechaun death message not showing
  • Ally projectiles toggle - off
  • Friends List - not seeing all online friends
  • Infinite loading screen for Steam users that connected account to web
  • Joining friends' server from the social menu does not work
  • Large and small Alien cloths display text
  • Not all alive character displayed after death on another character
  • Not proper handling zip files on steam
  • Oryx quest completed in new Realm
  • Package from shop disappears when you purchased all possible (limited) quantities
  • Quest markers showing inanimate objects
  • Quest portraits display when the setting is turned "on"
  • Right clicking on names in chat is not working properly
  • The button to join the server of a person on your friends tab does not work as intended
  • Weird Friends List/Guild overlay cutting
  • Wrong dungeons list on stats popup
  • You can use “Join” button on full dungeons and be send to Nexus

    • Implemented changes:

  • Adjust Fame/HP/MP colors
  • Art adjustments on GUI
  • Change ToS and privacy link in launcher
  • Display 8/8 in yellow
  • Floating icons background to fit UI
  • Friends - Online/Offline visuals
  • Legends Leaderboard - fixed draggable Equiment
  • Options - Toggles colored (red - off / green - on)
  • Polished Attributes display - now with smaller font and bigger gap between |

    • To apply changes players need to download new launcher and client via launcher.

    We are constantly working on bug reports from you. We are planning to release another patch next week.

    DECA Team

    #Join us on:

    https://www.reddit.com/r/RotMG/

    https://Discord.gg/rotmg

    https://www.facebook.com/rotmg/

title: RotMG Exalt - Supporter Beta is live!
text:
Greeting Realmers,

We’re as thrilled as you are that the Realm Exalt Supporter Beta is finally getting into your hands! It’s been a long journey, one which we simply could not have done without your support and patience along the way. And now the time has come for us to make good on a promised reward to those who supported us back at the start with the Supporter Beta access tier.

We are happy that many of you Supporters have already joined the special Realm Exalt Reddit and Discord (remember to use command “!exalt” in #bot-channel if you are Beta Supporter).

We mentioned that the most important part of the Supporter Beta is finding new bugs that will improve the overall gameplay. With your help, we will be able to polish Realm Exalt and present it in its best version once it hits the Open Beta phase where the whole community will be able to play.

We also wanted to share some system and hardware requirements.

System Requirements

Minimum:

  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8 (32/64-bit) / Mac OS X 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD A10 5700
  • Memory: 8GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250MB available space
  • Resolution: 800x600
  • FPS: 30

    • Recommended

  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32/64-bit) / Mac OS X 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (6GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250MB available space
  • Resolution: 1920x1080
  • FPS: 60

    • Note: Driver features that can boost frame rates like “Enhanced Sync” by AMD or similar should be disabled in order to guarantee a smooth Gameplay experience.

    Step on how to access the Supporter Beta (Steam included) -> LINK!

    Mind that once you log in, the graphic settings will be turned low by default.

    Important!

    This is the beta of Realm Exalt - we do not recommend you to play with your top characters, as you might experience bugs which may lead to death. Remember that although it is a beta client you are playing on PRODUCTION servers and any progress/deaths will stay on your production account.

    We wanted to also remind you that sharing your account’s credentials with other players is against our ToS. If you already shared your credentials with someone, we advise you to change your password to protect your account.

    Update on Welcome Back Gift: Welcome Back Gift can also be consumed on already maxed characters so watch out! It will give you the XP even if your stats are already maxed out, so be careful on what character you use it!

    Join us on:

    https://www.reddit.com/r/RotMG/

    https://Discord.gg/rotmg

    https://www.facebook.com/rotmg/
